title: 81:  BachNation Q&A
itunes:title: 81:  BachNation Q&A
description:
The Broads answer/laugh their way through a flurry of #bachnation questions regarding personal opinions, some bach contestant tea, F/M/K rounds, some Bachelor Pete discussion, and more! 
Thank you for sending in your questions, Broads! 
THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS:

*** CIRKUL: Get your own Cirkul bottle plus two flavor cartridges for just $5 by going to Drinkcirkul.com/CHATTY and using code CHATTY!
*** FIGS: For 15% OFF your first purchase go to wearFIGS.com (http://wearfigs.com/) and enter code CHATTY at checkout!
